name: Grue's Mission
description:
For Best results download the game to play it. The web build has small issues. EX: The black sprite at the beginning fixes itself after you die This game was made for Mini-Jam 99 - Birds.
It was also made using the bonus limitation of only using the Grue Palette     In Grue's Mission, you play as Grue the Pigeon as he makes his way through a randomly generated dungeon to  defeat the almighty Mega Pigeon before his time runs out. If you let time run out, you die, but if you eliminate the evil pigeons, you get more time to succeed.      Everything in Grue's Mission is randomly generated from the dungeon layouts to the enemy placements to the enemy speed etc.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

(If you don't know where to go to start, go upwards to the shop first to equip a gun of your choice, then go out, then to the right where it says play to enter the level.)
